headline: Big Ed's Cajun Shrimp Soup
name: Big Ed's Cajun Shrimp Soup
description: This hearty Cajun soup is easy! It's loaded with flavor, featuring plump shrimp, white rice, aromatics, and spices simmered in a tomato-based broth.
recipeIngredient: 0.75 pound fresh shrimp, peeled and deveined

recipeInstructions.text: Melt butter in a large pot over medium heat. Add bell pepper, onions, and garlic; sauté until tender. Stir in vegetable juice, clam juice, water, salt, thyme, basil, red pepper flakes, and bay leaf; bring to a boil.
Stir in rice, then reduce the heat, cover, and simmer until rice is tender, about 15 minutes. Stir in shrimp and cook until opaque, about 5 minutes. Discard bay leaf. Season with hot sauce to serve.
